Method Detail

createInputChild

public RandomAccessInput createInputChild(long offset,
                                          long length,
                                          int byteOrder,
                                          boolean syncPointer)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Create RandomAccessInput child from given offset

Parameters:
offset - offset in parent stream
byteOrder - byte order for new stream
syncPointer - if true then streams will share same stream position
Returns:
RandomAccessInput
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Parameters:
offset - offset in parent (for created InputStream) stream
Returns:
InputStream

public long getChildPosition(java.io.InputStream child)
get stream position of child InputStream (created with createInputStream());

Parameters:
child - child InputStream
Returns:
Stream position or -1 if supplied InputStream is not a child of this stream
